issue.title: [Java] Implement RecordBatch IPC buffer compression from ARROW-300
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8672](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8672). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8672?focusedCommentId=17098183) by Liya Fan (fan_li_ya):*
`[~wesm]` This issue looks interesting. May I try to provide a patch for it?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8672?focusedCommentId=17098575) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Sure please feel free

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8672?focusedCommentId=17154980) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Since this involves introducing dependencies into the Java build this seems too risky for the next few days

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8672?focusedCommentId=17343180) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Is there any plan to implement ZStandard compression as well?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8672?focusedCommentId=17343201) by Liya Fan (fan_li_ya):*
`[~apitrou]` We have already supported it in ARROW-12110.
I have linked that issue as a sub-work item of this.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8672?focusedCommentId=17343204) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Great, so this issue can be closed I supposed?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8672?focusedCommentId=17343217) by Liya Fan (fan_li_ya):*
Almost. I think there are still some performance tuning and clean-up work (ARROW-12163, ARROW-12115, ARROW-11901) to do before we can close it?

I have linked those issues as well.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8672?focusedCommentId=17343218) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
If you want, but this issue was really about making buffer compression available. Performance improvements are a separate concern, IMHO.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8672?focusedCommentId=17343223) by Liya Fan (fan_li_ya):*
Make sense. 
So it should be reasonable to close this issue now.
